items: Are new Promises created only when necessary (avoiding the Promise constructor anti-pattern)?
Is .then() chaining kept flat to maintain readability?
Are errors propagated correctly through the promise chain?
Is Promise.allSettled() used when all results are needed regardless of success/failure?
Is Promise.race() used appropriately for timeout or first-responder logic?
Are promises cleaned up (e.g., cancelling timers) if they are no longer needed?
